column5: ....Just hooked up the boat and now waiting for a buddy to show and we're of to Lake Erie. With any luck I'll have a report when I get back. The target for the afternoon is silver bass but I'd settle for just about anything. It's been to long since I last fished and admittedly I'll be happy just getting the boat wet.  Have a great day everyone.
Go get 'em Chris, haven't seen a report from you in a while, hope its a successful one.  And, you know it, PICTURES, PICTURES, PICTURES, regardless of catching success.
Have a great time, Chris. Looking forward to the pics and words. Be well.......and safe also.
Looking forward to your report........have fun out there!!
Give 'em hell Chris...  Great therapy for the soul...
Wow what a spring,first Roy with a report and pics and Chris out in his boat before Lakair!!!Best of luck bud! Joe
